Title: BarCode Scanner for Windows Phone 8 & 8.1(Silverlight)
Description: Use your camera like barcode scanner in your Windows Phone 8 & 8.1(silverlight) apps.
HomeWiki:
BarCode Scanner for Windows Phone 8 & 8.1(Silverlight)



This is a simple Barcode scanner control to use in your apps for Windows Phone 8 and Windows Phone 8.1(Silverlight) apps.

This control use Zxing.Net library (http://zxingnet.codeplex.com/)

 

I hope this control helps.
